cart.title: Cart
cart.empty_body:
Looks like you haven't added
anything to your cart yet

order_status.title: Order status
order_status.body_search:
You can find status of your order.
Just enter your order id
and will see information about status.
order_status.body_processing:
Your order is processing.
Now we are clarifying the details of your order
and will soon start preparing it.
order_status.body_cooking:
Now our chefs are preparing your order
and will try to do it as quickly and tasty as possible.
order_status.body_delivering: Our courier is on its way to you.
order_status.body_done:
Your order has been delivered,
we wish you bon appetit.
order_status.body_no_result: We did not find an order for the id you entered.

dialog.body_type_1: The cart contains items from another place. Do you want to empty the cart and add the selected item?
dialog.body_type_2: Selected item has been successfully added to the cart
